cobblemon.species.umbravis.name: Umbravis
seavlbizarremon.species.umbravis.desc: This Umbreon somehow became stronger from a emblem. It's way of teaching is to beating it's opponents until it is knocked out.
cobblemon.species.glacida.name: Glacida
seavlbizarremon.species.glacida.desc: It lives in low temperature caves to find it's pray. It freezes the air around it to make icicle towards it's enemy. Also finds a neat submarine
cobblemon.species.joltinum.name: Joltinum
seavlbizarremon.species.joltinum.desc: Burrowing a CW19-5 missile launcher, this Jolteon somehow easily controls it.
cobblemon.species.megwar.name: Megwar
seavlbizarremon.species.megwar.desc: It wants revenge who take it's dorsal fin. This brutal Pokémon was modified by Team Aqua. it rival it's mega evolution.
cobblemon.species.vaporila.name: Vaporila
cobblemon.species.flarichi.name: Flarichi
cobblemon.species.krokellang.name: Krokellang
seavlbizarremon.species.krokellang.desc: The three gears that compose this Pokémon spin at high speed, making the blimp float. Using the two guns, It fires a barrage of spikes when spinning very fast.
cobblemon.species.mortarb.name: Mortarb
cobblemon.species.spiritempest.name: Spiritempest
cobblemon.species.leaforest.name: Leaforest
seavlbizarremon.species.leaforest.desc: This Leafeon manage to grow a tree on it's back, it's tree differs depending on it's gender. It uses it's tree to thorns off or tangle it's foe.
cobblemon.species.sylvijou.name: Sylvijou
seavlbizarremon.species.sylvijou.desc: This may look like a regular Sylveon in a dress, however it can materialize objects at will due to a mysterious gem on both of it's bow ties. It's prefer weapon was machine guns.
cobblemon.species.kringwar.name: Kringwar
seavlbizarremon.species.kringwar.desc: Klingler with a giant hammer claw
cobblemon.species.scarablet.name: Scarablet
cobblemon.species.clockage.name: Clockage
seavlbizarremon.species.clockage.desc: A random clock that suddeny turn into a pokemon. The clock on it's head is the time it was out.
cobblemon.species.minadial.name: Minadial
seavlbizarremon.species.minadial.desc: It's bell has grown due to the influence of heat. It wanders around aimlessly in the dessert finding a well to hang on.
cobblemon.species.mechabang.name: Mechabang
seavlbizarremon.species.mechabang.desc: Mechabang's bell sound is equivalent of a million bells ringing at the same time. This pokemon is very similar to metagross, it is unknown as if they are related.
cobblemon.species.mimivee.name: Mimivee
seavlbizarremon.species.mimivee.desc: There was a scientist who peeked under Mimivee's old rag in the name of research. The scientist died of a mysterious disease.
This intelligent Pokémon has a very daring disposition. It knocks netherrack into the sky with it's dragon arm, aiming for flying Charizard.
seavlbizarremon.species.tinkatuff_nether: This Pokémon will attack groups of Heatmor and Durant, gathering the bones and skin from them in order to create a large and sturdy battle ram.
seavlbizarremon.species.tinkatink_nether: It lives in bastions for supplies of spectral arrow. It creates a sturdy core made of magma and spectral arrows that will be use to create a battle ram.
cobblemon.species.vaporipotent.name: Vaporipotent
seavlbizarremon.species.vaporipotent.des: A divine Vaporeon that trembles those who face it, hyponotising it's opponents if the opposite gender. It is unobtainable through natural gameplay currently.
cobblemon.species.regihydro.name: Regihydro
seavlbizarremon.species.regihydro.desc: It's body is composed of a mix of water stone and mysthic water. It converts the air around it and make a powerful stream of water.
cobblemon.species.regimoss.name: Regimoss
seavlbizarremon.species.regimoss.desc: It's entire body is a moss rock. A shine of sunlight can regenerate itself completely due to photosynthesis.
cobblemon.species.dragash.name: Dragash
seavlbizarremon.species.dragash.desc: It uses it's side blades to cut through hard steel without touching it, also releasing mysterious fums. It is known as the dancing blade because of how fast it spins.
cobblemon.species.dralily.name: Dralily
seavlbizarremon.species.dralily.desc: It's capable of flying faster than 120 mph. The sharp blades at the side is able to cut through ice in order to maneuver the icy terrain
cobblemon.species.drimid.name: Drimid
seavlbizarremon.species.drimid.desc: It flies over the ocean following the winds like a leaf. It can slice packs of ice easily.
seavlbizarremon.species.varoom_nether.de: As this pokemon is adapting in to the nether enviornment, it build itself a cannon on top of it's body to protect it from prey.
seavlbizarremon.species.revavroom_nether: The cannon on top of it's body is compress of hot molten lava, ready to fire a burning cannon ball.
cobblemon.species.leafipotent.name: Leafipotent
seavlbizarremon.species.leafipotent.desc: A godess Leafeon that gives life and hope, healing everything it touches. It is unobtainable through natural gameplay currently.
cobblemon.species.espilevi.name: Espilevi
seavlbizarremon.species.espilevi.desc: Using a strange mystical crystal, this Espeon can control this behemoth of a creature.
seavlbizarremon.species.tandemaus_seavli: These pair have been traveling along through the seas, gathering as much materials as possible in order to make a better boat.
seavlbizarremon.species.maushold_seavlia: They gather so much material, it is enough for 10 little ones to stay for comfortability. The ship they ride on can withstand icebergs using a hidden drill.
cobblemon.species.qwilton.name: Qwilton
seavlbizarremon.species.qwilton.desc: It expand it's body and body slams the foe when disturbed. On land, it rolls at high speeds in pursuit of shiny gold nuggets.
cobblemon.species.golbur.name: Golbur
cobblemon.species.hyburst.name: Hyburst
